name: Escape the Grid VR
description: Welcome to the grid subject 8102, this is a VR simulation where you must use your physical abilities to climb, jump and boost your way through the levels to prove to the sphere you have what it takes to escape...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-6600 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
